00024 GrProjection::GrProjection( float fov, float farDist, float aspect, const MPlane& nearClipPlane )
00025 : _fov( fov )
00026 , _nearClip( nearClipPlane )
00027 , _farDist( farDist )
00028 , _aspect( aspect )
00029 , _left( -1.0f )
00030 , _right( 1.0f )
00031 , _bottom( -1.0f )
00032 , _top( 1.0f )
00033 , _dirty( true )
00034 {
00035         B_ASSERT( fov >= 0.0f );
00036 }

00038 //----------------------------------------------------------
00039 GrProjection::GrProjection( float left, float right, float bottom, float top, float farDist )
00040 : _fov( 0.0f )
00041 , _farDist( farDist )
00042 , _nearClip( MVec3( 0.0f, 0.0f, -1.0f ), MVec3( 0.0f, 0.0f, -1.0f ) )
00043 , _aspect( 1.0f )
00044 , _left( left )
00045 , _right( right )
00046 , _bottom( bottom )

00064 //----------------------------------------------------------
00065 void
00066 GrProjection::BuildRayOffsets( float& px, float& py, float& ax, float& ay, float x, float y )
00067 {
00069         if ( IsOrtho() )
00070         {
00072                 float tx = 0.5f * x + 0.5f;
00073                 float ty = 0.5f * y + 0.5f;
00074 
00076                 px = Lerp( _left, _right, tx );
00077                 py = Lerp( _bottom, _top, ty );
00078                 ax = 0.0f;
00079                 ay = 0.0f;
00080         }
00081         else
00082         {
00084                 float projNear = 1.0f / Tan( _fov * 0.5f );
00085                 float xOffset = ( _right + _left ) / ( _right - _left );
00086                 float yOffset = ( _top + _bottom ) / ( _top - _bottom );
00087                 float xScale = 2.0f / ( _right - _left );
00088                 float yScale = 2.0f / ( _top - _bottom );
00089                 xScale /= _aspect;
00090 
00092                 ax = ( x + xOffset ) / ( xScale * projNear );
00093                 ay = ( y + yOffset ) / ( yScale * projNear );
00094                 px = 0.0f;
00095                 py = 0.0f;
00096         }
00097 }
00098 
00099 //----------------------------------------------------------
00100 void
00101 GrProjection::SetFOV( float fov )
00102 {
00103         B_ASSERT( fov >= 0.0f );
00104         _dirty = true;
00105         _fov = fov;
00106 }
00107 
00108 //----------------------------------------------------------
00109 const MMat4x4&
00110 GrProjection::GetMatrix() const
00111 {
00113         if ( _dirty )
00114         {
00116                 B_ASSERT( Abs( _right - _left ) > 0.0001f );
00117                 B_ASSERT( Abs( _top - _bottom ) > 0.0001f );
00118 
00119                 float xScale = 2.0f / ( _right - _left );
00120                 float yScale = 2.0f / ( _top - _bottom );
00121                 float xOffset = ( _right + _left ) / ( _right - _left );
00122                 float yOffset = ( _top + _bottom ) / ( _top - _bottom );
00123 
00126                 if ( !IsOrtho() )
00127                 {
00129                         float projNear = 1.0f / Tan( _fov * 0.5f );
00130 
00132                         _mat( 0, 0 ) = xScale * projNear / ( _aspect );
00133                         _mat( 0, 1 ) = 0.0f;
00134                         _mat( 0, 2 ) = xOffset;
00135                         _mat( 0, 3 ) = 0.0f;
00136 
00137                         _mat( 1, 0 ) = 0.0f;
00138                         _mat( 1, 1 ) = yScale * projNear;
00139                         _mat( 1, 2 ) = yOffset;
00140                         _mat( 1, 3 ) = 0.0f;
00141 
00142                         _mat( 2, 0 ) = 0.0f;
00143                         _mat( 2, 1 ) = 0.0f;
00144                         _mat( 2, 2 ) = -1.0f; //( projNear + _farDist ) / ( projNear - _farDist );
00145                         _mat( 2, 3 ) = -1.0f; //_farDist * projNear / ( projNear - _farDist );
00146 
00147                         _mat( 3, 0 ) = 0.0f;
00148                         _mat( 3, 1 ) = 0.0f;
00149                         _mat( 3, 2 ) = -1.0f;
00150                         _mat( 3, 3 ) = 0.0f;
00151 
00154                         AddNearClip();
00155                 }
00156                 else
00157                 {
00159                         B_ASSERT( _farDist > 0.01f );
00160 
00162                         _mat( 0, 0 ) = xScale;
00163                         _mat( 0, 1 ) = 0.0f;
00164                         _mat( 0, 2 ) = 0.0f;
00165                         _mat( 0, 3 ) = -xOffset;
00166 
00167                         _mat( 1, 0 ) = 0.0f;
00168                         _mat( 1, 1 ) = yScale;
00169                         _mat( 1, 2 ) = 0.0f;
00170                         _mat( 1, 3 ) = -yOffset;
00171 
00172                         _mat( 2, 0 ) = 0.0f;
00173                         _mat( 2, 1 ) = 0.0f;
00174                         _mat( 2, 2 ) = ( -1.0f / _farDist );
00175                         _mat( 2, 3 ) = 0.0f;
00176 
00177                         _mat( 3, 0 ) = 0.0f;
00178                         _mat( 3, 1 ) = 0.0f;
00179                         _mat( 3, 2 ) = 0.0f;
00180                         _mat( 3, 3 ) = 1.0f;
00181                 }
00182 
00184                 _dirty = false;
00185         }
00186 
00188         return _mat;
00189 }

00224         const MVec3& clipNormal = _nearClip.GetNormal();
00225         _mat( 2, 0 ) = clipNormal.GetX();
00226         _mat( 2, 1 ) = clipNormal.GetY();
00227         _mat( 2, 2 ) = clipNormal.GetZ();
00228         _mat( 2, 3 ) = _nearClip.GetD();
00229 }
